data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_f070d82521ecd2e14d4ef3f25880830a.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills apply a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Starlium Charge</font> to enemies on hit. When Ixia performs a Basic Attack on an enemy with two stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Starlium Charge</font>, the attack will consume the stacks and be replaced with <font color="a6aafb">Siphon Starlium</font>, dealing <font color="fba51f"> (+150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="26e407">(+200 Lifesteal)</font> plus (+10*Hero Level) <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the target. Ixia recovers HP equal to the damage dealt by <font color="a6aafb">Siphon Starlium</font> (only 20<font color="26e407">(+150 Lifesteal)</font>% against non-hero units).
<font color="a6aafb">Siphon Starlium</font> can trigger on all enemies in front of Ixia that are within her Basic Attack range, but it cannot Crit.
Ixia's Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.

Ixia fires 2 Starlium-charged energy beams along the ground in the target direction, dealing 75<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a rectangular area and slowing enemy heroes by 50%. Upon hitting an enemy hero, Ixia also gains 2 Movement Speed for s.

Enemies hit by both beams will take double damage.

Ixia unleashes a canister of Starlium energy in the target direction, knocking back nearby enemies, and pulling enemies in range to the center line after a short delay and dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

Ixia reassembles her weapon into 6 smaller weapons and enters the <font color="a6aafb">Barrage</font> state for 4s. In this state, Ixia's Basic Attacks and skills can hit enemies in the large fan-shaped area in front of her but not outside it. Ixia's Basic Attacks can hit up to 6 enemy units (prioritizes heroes), and <font color="a6aafb">Siphon Starlium</font> will fire simultaneously with her normal Basic Attacks.

data.name: Ixia
data.story: The leader of Bad Soul and self-proclaimed inventor, she wields a homemade weapon powered by a stolen Starlium reactor.

assist.desc: With her Ultimate, Ixia is capable of dealing impressive sustained damage. So she works best with heroes with area CC abilities, like Atlas and Vexana.

strong.desc: Ixia's skills make her a nice kiter. She works well against heroes with short ranges or poor Slow abilities, such as Fredrinn and Bane.

weak.desc: Ixia lacks survivability, that's why she can be countered by heroes with high burst damage or strong control abilities such as Saber and Aamon.
